title: [Gorget Trails, Ledge]
description: A portion of this very shallow ledge has been washed away by a steady trickle of water running down the face of the cliff.  Flecks of smoky mica sparkle in shafts of silvery moonlight and a stink beetle parades slowly along the edge of the path.

A portion of this very shallow ledge has been washed away by a steady trickle of water running down the face of the cliff.  Flecks of smoky mica sparkle in the sun, and a stink beetle parades slowly along the edge of the path.
